name: Dragonfly - Gdevelop space simulation demo
description:
Pseudo 3D space simulation made with Gdevelop.

My attempt  to do something different and show what Gdevelop is capable of with use of tween function and particles.This is a demo,not a game though in Ixion scene is possible to control ship with arrows, although the action is scripted.

Sound problems occurs in the web version, the sound of the engine does not loop and other sounds sometimes late.There are no such problems in Gdevelop source.

View full demo at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fnnpzAcIcc8

You are free to use the source whatever you want.

Assets

Music: Zefz , Cesar da Rocha , bigmanjoe ,  klavo1985           

Planets art: Viktor Hahn

Starcraft avatars: Artanis186

Rotating globe animation: Irregularsaturn

Asteroid animation:  Cmdr G

SFX: IanStarGem , tutarap, Mirko Sukovic , Nenad Simic , Cadere Sounds

Space station: pngegg

Cockpit: nicepng

Space backgrounds: Wallpaperscraft

Hyperdrive particle effect: Wishforge Games

Thanks for the support Gdevelop game engine Facebook group
